org.jerkar.tool.builtins.javabuild

Class JkJavaPacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.tool.builtins.javabuild.JkJavaPacker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class JkJavaPacker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Jar maker for the JkJavaBuild template. This maker will get information from supplied java builder to create relevant jars.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  JkJavaPacker.Builder
      A builder for JkJavaBuild
      static interface  JkJavaPacker.JkExtraPacking
      JkExtraPacking action that will be processed by the JkJavaBuild.pack method.
